name: Grandpa's House (itch)
description:
Grandpa's House it's Horror game By MOHAMED Button Games

Controls: (W,S,A,D) To Move
                      (W + Shift) To Run
                      (LMB) To Interact
                      (E) To Open/Close The Doors
                      (C) To Crouch
                      (F) To Turn ON/OFF Your Flashlight

Story: You moved to a new house, Noticed there are forest and an old house, You went to the old house to check if there are people living there, Noticed there's someone holding a knife, When you entered the house he punch you in the face And knock you down, Can you escape?

Objectives: Find the basement key to exit the basement, Find the master key to exit the house, Good luck.

Cheating tips: Error.
